item.title: hugo语法
item.description: 1. hugo 2. Ace Document button The button shortcode allows you to add a button to the page. This button is a HTML anchor element and can thus be used to link to another page or website. Button Button Button Button Button Button Button Usage Place the following shortcode on the page Copy {{< button style="STYLE" link="https://yourwebsite.com" >}} [content] {{< /button >}} Parameters style The style parameter is directly applied to the alert as a class in the format “btn-{STYLE}".
